task.title: Delete an Existing Comment for a Variable

step.cmd: Depending on the status of an activity, select Perform or In Progress for the activity associated with the variable.
step.stepresult: The page for entering data for the modifiable variables appears.

step.cmd: Select , and then select Add/Edit Comment for a variable.
step.stepresult: A comments list in the window for entering comments for the selected variable appears.

step.cmd: Select Yes to complete the delete action.
step.stepresult: An information message that the comment was successfully deleted appears in the page for entering data for the modifiable variables.

taskbody.result: The comment is deleted for the variable.
